title: Refer a friend
body: So i refered my friend years ago i cant find his account name becasue we never friended how can i find the account name so i can play with him again

replies.body:
i was wondering because it showed you the list of people you refereed and what they got you and their
 username i just need the list

Aside from reaching out and asking him, there's really no other way.  It's not a kind of information we have handy, especially with RAF no longer being available.  Due to privacy liabilities, we also wouldn't be able to share that info even if we did.  I hope that helps clear things up, and that you find your friend!
